name: 夏葉
text:
あっ、プロデューサー
コンビニのご飯ばかりじゃ健康的とは言えないわね
trans:
Ah, Producer. Only eating food from the
convinince store is bad for you, you know?

name: 夏葉
text: 自分で作ると健康にいいものも作れるし、オススメよ？
trans:
It's much easier to eat healthy food when you make it yourself.
Would you like some recommendations?

text:
やっぱり
いい材料を使うのか？
trans:
I figure it's about
the right ingredients?

Sounds like a
lot of trouble.

name: 夏葉
text:
作り方ね、もちろんいいわ♪
教えたらちゃんと毎日作るのよ？
trans:
Of course I can teach you ♪
If I do, you'll make your own food every day, right?

name: 夏葉
text:
アナタが身体を壊すと私たちみんな困るんだから
体調管理はしっかりね？
trans:
If your body starts failing you, it would affect us too,
so be sure to watch your health, ok?

name: 夏葉
text:
確かにいいものを使えばおいしいものはできるけど
そればかりじゃ栄養が偏るわ
trans:
It's true, good food requires using the right ingredients,
but we have to take nutrition into account.

name: 夏葉
text:
そういうバランスに気を付けるためにも
自分で作るのが１番！　外食じゃそうはいかないわよ
trans:
Making your own food is most important when trying to
keep a balanced diet. That makes eating out is a no-go.

name: 夏葉
text: 何を言っているの？　身体を壊すほうがよっぽど大変だわ
trans:
What are you saying? It would be far worse
if you damaged your health.

name: 夏葉
text: 体調管理の為には自炊を選択するのが当然よ
trans:
Preparing your own food for the sake of
your health should be a given.

name: プロデューサー
text: （うっ……しまった。別のことを言えば良かったな……）
trans:
(Ah…… I screwed up.
I should have said something else……)
